name: Push and Pull (cmsatpun)
description:
Thanks for checking out my game! It's my first TriJam submission and I worked on it over one ~2.5-hour sitting. The theme for this week (#189) is "Push and pull."

Help two stick figures deliver a box in rough wind by coordinating their efforts and preventing them from overexerting themselves. Timing your pushing and pulling is crucial to succeed!

Box and terrain assets available here; everything else was made by me using Godot/GIMP/FL Studio.
